workoutPlans.title: Beginner Workout Plan
workoutPlans.description: A 4-week beginner workout plan for overall fitness.

workoutPlans.title: Weight Loss Workout Plan
workoutPlans.description: A 12-week workout plan designed for weight loss.

mealPlans.title: Vegetarian Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A 7-day vegetarian meal plan for a balanced diet.
meals: Monday: Breakfast - Oatmeal, Lunch - Salad, Dinner - Vegetable Stir-fry
Tuesday: Breakfast - Smoothie, Lunch - Lentil Soup, Dinner - Stuffed Bell Peppers
Wednesday: Breakfast - Yogurt with Fruits, Lunch - Quinoa Salad, Dinner - Veggie Burger
Thursday: Breakfast - Avocado Toast, Lunch - Vegetable Curry, Dinner - Ratatouille
Friday: Breakfast - Chia Pudding, Lunch - Chickpea Salad, Dinner - Veggie Tacos
Saturday: Breakfast - Pancakes, Lunch - Greek Salad, Dinner - Vegetable Pasta
Sunday: Breakfast - Fruit Bowl, Lunch - Veggie Wrap, Dinner - Tofu Stir-fry

mealPlans.title: High Protein Meal Plan
mealPlans.description: A 7-day meal plan focused on high-protein foods.
meals: Monday: Breakfast - Scrambled Eggs, Lunch - Grilled Chicken Salad, Dinner - Baked Salmon
Tuesday: Breakfast - Greek Yogurt, Lunch - Beef Stir-fry, Dinner - Shrimp Skewers
Wednesday: Breakfast - Protein Smoothie, Lunch - Tuna Salad, Dinner - Grilled Steak
Thursday: Breakfast - Cottage Cheese with Fruits, Lunch - Turkey Wrap, Dinner - Quinoa Bowl
Friday: Breakfast - Egg White Omelette, Lunch - Chicken Breast with Broccoli, Dinner - Grilled Tofu
Saturday: Breakfast - Protein Pancakes, Lunch - Steak Salad, Dinner - Baked Cod
Sunday: Breakfast - Protein Waffles, Lunch - Roasted Chicken with Veggies, Dinner - Lentil Soup
